sentences.en: After the car had passed by they came out of hiding.
sentences.cn: 车子开过后,他们从藏身的地方走了出来.

sentences.en: After the trial, she had to go into hiding for several weeks.
sentences.cn: 审讯后她不得不躲藏了几个星期。

sentences.en: Don't come out of your hiding - place until I give you the okay.
sentences.cn: 得到我的同意你才能从躲藏的地方出来.

sentences.en: Gray is thought to be in hiding near the France/Italy border.
sentences.cn: 他们认为格雷藏在法国和意大利边境附近。

sentences.en: He kept his head down, hiding his features.
He rightly assumed that the boy was hiding.
sentences.cn: 他猜对了，那个男孩躲起来了。

sentences.en: He then dismembered her, hiding parts of her body in the cellar.
sentences.cn: 他接着将她肢解，将部分尸体藏在了地窖里。

sentences.en: Most hoarders have favorite hiding places.
sentences.cn: 多数喜好聚藏东西的人都有自己最喜欢的贮藏处。

sentences.en: The police blocked off the street where the gunman was hiding.
sentences.cn: 警察封锁了持枪歹徒躲藏的那条街.

sentences.en: The police were able to deduce where the fugitive was hiding.
sentences.cn: 警方成功地推断出那逃亡者躲藏的地方.

sentences.en: The seal on the box broke when it fell from its hiding-place.
sentences.cn: 盒子从隐藏处掉落时，封口裂开了。

sentences.en: They flushed them out of their hiding places.
sentences.cn: 他们把他们从藏身之处赶了出来。

sentences.en: Traditional hiding places are easy pickings for experienced burglars.
sentences.cn: 对有经验的入室窃贼来说，人们惯常藏钱的那些地方最容易得手。

sentences.en: We believe she may have played a part in hiding the cash.
sentences.cn: 我们认为她可能参与了藏匿现金。

phrases.phrase: be on a hiding to nothing
phrases.tran_cn: (英)不可能成功；即使成功也无多大优势

trans.tran_en: when someone stays somewhere in secret, especially because they have done something illegal or are in danger
